title: Maldives Paradise
description: Crystal clear waters and white sand beaches
additionalInfo: The Maldives is a tropical paradise with over 1,000 coral islands and some of the world's most luxurious resorts. Perfect for honeymooners and diving enthusiasts.

title: Bali Beaches
additionalInfo: Bali's beaches range from palm-fringed white sand coasts on the south to the more dramatic black sand beaches on the western shoreline. Don't miss the iconic sunset at Kuta Beach.

title: Santorini Shores
description: Volcanic beaches with unique black sand
additionalInfo: Santorini's beaches are unlike any other in the world, with red, black, and white volcanic sands. The Red Beach near Akrotiri and the black sand beach of Perissa are must-visits.
